name: Object Detection Python Sample
description: An app that starts a ZEd, performs Object Detection and sends logs, telemetry and video events.

release.description: Sample that detects people using ZED SDK and sends video events.

$draw_bboxes.name: Draw Bboxes
$draw_bboxes.description: If selected, will draw boxes around detected people in on the camera live view

$recordVideoEvent.name: Enable Video Events
$recordVideoEvent.description: If selected some video Event will be recorded when someone will be detected on the video

$nbFramesNoDetBtw2Events.name: Number of frames without det Btw 2 Events
$nbFramesNoDetBtw2Events.description: Number of frames without detection between two video event: if no one is seen for the defined number of frame, next time that someone is detected a new event is defined instead of continuing previous event

$recordTelemetry.name: Record Telemetry
$recordTelemetry.description: If selected, the app will send the number of people detected and other info as telemetry

$telemetryFreq.name: Telemetry frequency
$telemetryFreq.description: Telemetry frequency defined how often telemetry is generated by the app. Every 10 seconds by default
